wikitext.*:
'''Great Hall''' can refer to:

* The [[Great Hall of Feasts]], the King’s feasting-hall in [[Minas Tirith]].
* The [[Great Hall of Osgiliath]], the royal hall of the Kings in [[Osgiliath]].
* The [[Great Hall of Thráin]], the main hall of [[Erebor]] where [[Smaug]] had his bed of gold.
* The [[Great Hall of Wootton Major]] in the town of [[Wootton Major]], where the villagers met for various occasions, including [[The Feast of Good Children]].
{{disambig}}
